name: minijson
tagline: C++ DOM-less JSON parsing and serialization
body:
# `minijson`

minijson is a C++ library for JSON parsing and serialization that does not use any DOM intermediate representation. With `minijson` you trade the convenience of the DOM for the possibility of writing and parsing JSON messages without allocating a single byte of memory.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
